thread.title: Meet The Lead Pair Of Karan Johar's Next Film
thread.title_full: Meet The Lead Pair Of Karan Johar's Next Film

title: Meet The Lead Pair Of Karan Johar's Next Film
text:
facebook 188 SHARES 
Karan Johar is back with his next movie, and this time he's paired Sonakshi Sinha and Sidharth Malhotra for a sizzling chemistry in Ittefaq . 
The film is a remake of the 1969 thriller of the same name, which was directed by Yash Chopra, and had Rajesh Khanna and Nanda in the lead. A post shared by Karan Johar (@karanjohar) on Feb 20, 2017 at 5:17am PST 
The movie is directed by Abhay Chopra, and is co-produced by Karan's Dharma Production, Shah Rukh Khan's Red Chillies, and BR Studios. A post shared by Shah Rukh Khan (@iamsrk) on Feb 20, 2017 at 5:28am PST 
We are quite excited to see this new B-town jodi .
